partitioning.algorithm.HMetis

Class HMetis

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.CObject
      • common.algorithm.Algorithm
        • partitioning.algorithm.PTAlgorithm
          • partitioning.algorithm.HMetis.HMetis

  • public class HMetis
extends PTAlgorithm
    The HMetis class implements the HMetis algorithm in the partitioning stage.
    Author:
    Vincent Mirian
    Date:
    Today
